text: I cannot think of any need in childhood as strong as the need for a father's protection.
author: Sigmund Freud

text: Even as kids reach adolescence, they need more than ever for us to watch over them. Adolescence is not about letting go. It's about hanging on during a very bumpy ride.
author: Ron Taffel

text: Mothers all want their sons to grow up to be president, but they don't want them to become politicians in the process.
author: John F. Kennedy

text: A mother who is really a mother is never free.
author: Honore de Balzac

text: Children are educated by what the grown-up is and not by his talk.
author: Carl Jung
